main_definition: To be the essential parts or elements that form a whole, or to have something as an important component.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make up or form part of a whole
meanings_and_examples.example: Education constitutes a major aspect of personal development.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To consist of essential elements that define the nature or character of something
meanings_and_examples.example: Diversity and inclusion are fundamental constituents of a healthy workplace culture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be considered as an important factor or element in determining the value, quality, or importance of something
meanings_and_examples.example: Teamwork constitutes a critical component in achieving project success.
